drinks.name: Fresh Orange Juice
drinks.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice packed with Vitamin C

instructions: Wash oranges thoroughly and cut in half.
Squeeze oranges using a citrus juicer or manual juicer.
Strain the juice through a fine mesh to remove pulp if desired.
Add honey or sugar if you prefer sweeter juice.
Stir well and taste. Adjust sweetness as needed.
Serve over ice with fresh mint leaves if desired.
Best consumed fresh within 24 hours.

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.description: Classic homemade lemonade with fresh lemons and mint

instructions: Make simple syrup: Heat 1 cup water and sugar in a saucepan, stirring until sugar dissolves. Let cool.
Juice the lemons and strain to remove seeds and pulp.
In a large pitcher, combine lemon juice, simple syrup, and remaining 5 cups cold water.
Stir well and taste. Add more sugar or water to adjust sweetness/tartness.
Add lemon slices and bruised mint leaves.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
Serve over ice. Keeps in refrigerator for up to 1 week.
Remove seeds from watermelon and cube the flesh.
Peel and cube the mango.
Add watermelon and mango to blender.
Add lime juice, honey, and coconut water.
Blend on high speed until smooth.
Strain through fine mesh if desired for smoother texture.
Serve over ice with fresh mint garnish.
Best served immediately while fresh.
Wash and core apples, cut into chunks.
Peel and roughly chop fresh ginger.
Add apples and ginger to blender with water.
Blend on high speed until smooth.
Strain through fine mesh or cheesecloth.
Add lemon juice and honey, stir well.
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed.
Serve over ice with cinnamon stick garnish.
Cut fresh pineapple into chunks, removing core.
Add pineapple chunks to blender.
Add fresh mint leaves, lime juice, and honey.
Pour in coconut water and blend until smooth.
Strain through fine mesh to remove any fibrous bits.
Taste and adjust sweetness or tartness as needed.
Serve over ice with pineapple wedge garnish.
Store in refrigerator for up to 2 days.

drinks.name: Green Detox Juice
drinks.description: Coconut water, spinach, and cucumber blend

instructions: Wash all vegetables thoroughly.
Cut cucumber and celery into chunks.
Core the green apple and cut into pieces.
Add spinach, cucumber, celery, and apple to blender.
Add coconut water and blend until smooth.
Strain through fine mesh or cheesecloth.
Add ginger and lemon juice, stir well.
Serve over ice immediately for best nutrition.
Drink within 24 hours for maximum benefits.
Wash and roughly chop carrots (no need to peel).
Peel oranges and remove any seeds.
Peel and chop turmeric and ginger.
Add carrots, oranges, turmeric, and ginger to blender.
Add water and blend until completely smooth.
Strain through fine mesh or cheesecloth.
Add honey and stir well.
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed.
Serve over ice with orange slice garnish.
Best consumed fresh for maximum vitamin content.
Wash cranberries and blueberries thoroughly.
Add cranberries and blueberries to blender.
Add pomegranate juice, honey, and lemon juice.
Pour in water and blend until smooth.
Strain through fine mesh to remove berry skins.
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed.
Add more water if too thick.
Serve over ice with fresh berries as garnish.
Store in refrigerator for up to 3 days.
Wash spinach leaves thoroughly.
Peel banana and break into chunks.
Add spinach, banana, and mango to blender.
Pour in coconut water and add chia seeds.
Add honey and blend on high speed until smooth.
Add ice cubes and blend until desired consistency.
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed.
Serve immediately in a tall glass.
Best consumed within 30 minutes for maximum nutrition.
Wash fresh berries or use frozen berries.
Add berries to blender with almond milk.
Add protein powder, almond butter, and honey.
Add vanilla extract and blend until smooth.
Add ice cubes and blend until thick and creamy.
Taste and adjust sweetness or protein powder as needed.
Pour into glass and serve immediately.
Great for post-workout recovery.

drinks.name: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
drinks.description: Chocolate, banana, and peanut butter smoothie

instructions: Peel bananas and break into chunks.
Add bananas, cocoa powder, and peanut butter to blender.
Pour in milk and add honey and vanilla.
Blend on high speed until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes and blend until thick.
Taste and adjust sweetness or cocoa as needed.
Pour into glass and serve immediately.
Perfect for a healthy dessert or breakfast.
Add frozen pineapple and mango to blender.
Pour in coconut milk and orange juice.
Add coconut flakes and honey.
Blend on high speed until smooth.
Add ice cubes and blend until thick and creamy.
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed.
Pour into glass and garnish with more coconut flakes.
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise!
Add rolled oats to blender and pulse until coarsely ground.
Peel banana and add to blender.
Pour in milk and add almond butter, honey, and spices.
Blend on high speed until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes and blend until thick.
Taste and adjust sweetness or cinnamon as needed.
Pour into glass and serve immediately.
Tastes like a healthy oatmeal cookie in a glass!

drinks.name: Iced Coffee
drinks.description: Cold brew coffee with ice and a splash of milk

instructions: Combine coarsely ground coffee and cold water in a large jar.
Stir gently to ensure all coffee is wet.
Cover and refrigerate for 12-24 hours.
Strain the coffee concentrate through a fine mesh sieve or coffee filter.
Fill glasses with ice cubes.
Pour coffee concentrate over ice, filling about 2/3 of the glass.
Add milk or cream to taste.
Sweeten with sugar or simple syrup if desired.
Add a drop of vanilla extract for extra flavor.
Stir and serve immediately.

drinks.name: Bubble Tea
drinks.description: Taiwanese tea with chewy tapioca pearls

instructions: Steep black tea leaves in hot water for 5 minutes, then let cool.
Cook tapioca pearls according to package instructions.
Make brown sugar syrup by heating brown sugar with 1/4 cup water.
Add cooked pearls to syrup and let them soak for 10 minutes.
Fill glass with ice cubes.
Add brown sugar pearls to the bottom of the glass.
Pour cooled tea over ice, filling 3/4 of the glass.
Add milk or cream on top.
Stir well before drinking and enjoy with a wide straw!

drinks.name: Cappuccino
drinks.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam

instructions: Pull 2 shots of espresso into a cappuccino cup.
Heat milk in a small saucepan or steam wand to 150¬∞F (65¬∞C).
Froth the milk to create microfoam using a milk frother or whisk.
Pour steamed milk over espresso in a circular motion.
Create latte art or simply top with foam.
Dust with cocoa powder if desired.
Add sugar to taste and serve immediately.
Perfect ratio: 1/3 espresso, 1/3 steamed milk, 1/3 foam.
Combine instant coffee, sugar, and hot water in a bowl.
Whisk vigorously for 5-10 minutes until thick and creamy.
The mixture should form stiff peaks like whipped cream.
Fill glass with ice cubes if making iced version.
Pour milk into glass, leaving room at the top.
Scoop the whipped coffee mixture on top of the milk.
Mix before drinking to combine flavors.
Enjoy the creamy, frothy texture!
Brew strong coffee and let it cool completely.
Add cooled coffee, ice cubes, sugar, and milk to blender.
Add vanilla extract and blend on high speed until smooth.
Blend until the mixture is thick and slushy.
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed.
Pour into a tall glass.
Top with whipped cream and drizzle with chocolate syrup if desired.
Serve immediately with a straw.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: Cuban cocktail with rum, mint, and lime

ingredients: Lime wedge and mint sprig for garnish
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar in a glass.
Add lime juice and continue muddling.
Fill glass with ice cubes.
Pour rum over ice and stir well.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with lime wedge and mint sprig.
Stir gently and serve immediately.
Perfect for hot summer days!

drinks.name: Pi√±a Colada
drinks.description: Tropical cocktail with rum, pineapple, and coconut

instructions: Add rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream to blender.
Add ice cubes and blend until smooth and creamy.
Taste and adjust ingredients if needed.
Pour into a hurricane glass or tall glass.
Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.
Serve immediately with a straw.
Transport yourself to the Caribbean!

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: Classic tequila cocktail with lime and salt

ingredients: 1 tsp agave nectar or simple syrup
instructions: Rim glass with salt by running lime around edge and dipping in salt.
Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
Add tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and agave nectar.
Shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds.
Strain into prepared glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with lime wheel.
Serve immediately and enjoy the tangy, salty flavors!

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: Elegant vodka cocktail with cranberry and lime

instructions: Fill cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, and triple sec.
Shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with lime wheel.
Serve immediately and enjoy the sophisticated pink hue!
Perfect for special occasions.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: Classic whiskey cocktail with bitters and sugar

instructions: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass.
Add bitters and muddle until sugar is dissolved.
Add ice cubes to glass.
Pour whiskey over ice.
Stir gently for 30 seconds.
Express orange peel over drink and drop in glass.
Garnish with cherry if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy the classic flavors!
Heat water to 175¬∞F (80¬∞C, not boiling).
Add green tea leaves to teapot or infuser.
Pour hot water over tea leaves.
Steep for 2-3 minutes (not longer to avoid bitterness).
Strain tea leaves or remove infuser.
Add honey and lemon if desired.
Serve immediately for best flavor.
Green tea is rich in antioxidants!
Crush cardamom pods and add to saucepan with water.
Add cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and black pepper.
Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add tea leaves and simmer for 2 minutes.
Add milk and sugar, bring to a gentle boil.
Simmer for 2-3 minutes until well combined.
Strain through fine mesh into cups.
Serve hot and enjoy the aromatic spices!
Steep tea bags in hot water for 5 minutes.
Remove tea bags and stir in sugar until dissolved.
Add cold water to dilute the tea.
Let cool to room temperature.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Fill glasses with ice cubes.
Pour tea over ice and add lemon slices.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves.
Perfect for hot summer days!

drinks.name: Matcha Latte
drinks.description: Japanese powdered green tea with milk

instructions: Sift matcha powder to remove lumps.
Add hot water to matcha and whisk vigorously until frothy.
Heat milk in a saucepan or steam wand.
Add honey and vanilla to milk if desired.
Pour matcha mixture into cup.
Slowly pour steamed milk over matcha.
Create latte art or simply mix together.
Serve immediately and enjoy the earthy flavors!
Heat water to 200¬∞F (95¬∞C, just before boiling).
Add Earl Grey tea leaves to teapot or infuser.
Pour hot water over tea leaves.
Steep for 3-5 minutes depending on desired strength.
Remove tea leaves or strain.
Add milk, sugar, or lemon as desired.
Serve immediately for best flavor.
The bergamot gives it a unique citrusy aroma!
